title: Beginner Dose
text2: Mild pain relief ⋅ Stress ⋅ Anxiety ⋅ Other symptoms

title: Small Dose
text2: Stronger symptom relief ⋅ Euphoria ⋅ May impair coordination and alter perception
text3: Patients with persistent problems ⋅ Restless sleepers ⋅ Social butterflies

title: Moderate Dose
text2: Strong euphoria ⋅ Unaccustomed consumers may experience negative effects ⋅ May impair coordination and alter perception
text3: Well-seasoned consumers ⋅ Medical patients with developed tolerances ⋅ Experienced consumers seeking to sustain sleep

title: High Dose
text2: Very strong euphoria ⋅ Likely to impair coordination and alter perception
text3: Customers who have poor GI absorption of cannabinoids ⋅ People with significant tolerance to THC

title: Experienced User Dose
text2: Highly likely to impair coordination and alter perception ⋅ Can cause negative side effects such as rapid heart rate and nausea ⋅ May cause user perceived pain
text3: For experienced THC individuals only ⋅ Patients with cancer, inflammatory disorders, or conditions that necessitate high doses
